details: Part of a team building a Freelancer Productivity Platform.
Developing a clean and unified platform for freelancers, contractors, and small dev teams.
Features include work tracking, hour logging, task management, client progress sharing, and automated invoice generation.
Worked as part of the Tech Dev team responsible for designing and developing websites for various use cases.
Contributed to frontend implementation, layout design, and feature development.
Collaborated with team members to deliver functional, responsive, and maintainable web solutions.
